EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Tuesday, April 28th at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop - Denver
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Tuesday, April 28th in Denver, CO. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Tuesday, April 28th, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/denver>
Denver Marriott Tech Center 4900 S. Syracuse Street Denver, Co 80237 Maps & Directions <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/maps/travel/dentc-denver-marriott-tech-center/>
Parking Information Self parking is $10 daily. Valet parking is $16 daily.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS?
Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or via cell at (408) 425-9302 <408-425-9302>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/denver>
